Job Description: Description:The Jr. Developer is assigned to a specific software solution and is responsible for writing code to meet user interface specifications. Responsibilities also include defining user needs,  providing input to functional design and testing.Deliver quality code that meets requirements and specifications on time.Specific Role Responsibilities: Good knowledge of Java,  Webservices,  HTML5,  CSS and SQL .? Good understanding of object oriented concepts.? Understand testing/ build/ release cycles as part of the software management process.? Good team player and should be eager to learn new things from the domain and technical perspective.? Agile/ Scrum development experience preferred.
